Detailed Description

FusionScene provides easy memory management for FusionNodes.

See also:
FusionNode

Member Function Documentation

void FusionScene::SetDrawingMode (  bool  flat  )  [virtual]
 

Sets the drawing mode.

True for flat (ignores child/parent ordering) False for graph (cascade draws from the scene node)

void FusionScene::SetEnableSorting (  bool  enable  )  [virtual]
 

Use this to enable or disable global (flat) sorting.

Flat sorting should only be used if you aren't drawin using the scene graph (flat drawing)

void FusionScene::Sort (   )  [virtual]
 

Sorts child nodes in the global (flat) list by their depth attribute.

This sorts nodes so their position in the scene graph reflects their m_Depth attribute, in other words nodes with a lower m_Depth are drawn first.
This is only used when nodes aren't drawn via the graph (flat drawing).
